name: Knock Out Void
description:
Game created in Long Beach hackathon 2017.

Two player multiplayer in order you try to knock the opponent out

Can be played on mouse or gamepad

Controls:

Player 1 (Red):

  • Move up: W
  • Move down: A
  • Move left: S
  • Move right: D
  • Jump: Spacebar
  • Drop: X
  • Pause: esc

Player 2 (Blue):

  • Move up: I
  • Move down: K
  • Move left: J
  • Move right: L
  • Jump: M
  • Drop: Comma key (,)
  • Pause esc

    • If you are interested in helping with development or want to give any feedback, please, message me.

    Thanks for playing!
